swistrackcomponent.name: Calibration with a linear model
swistrackcomponent.description: This component applies a linear transformation to the particles to transform their pixel coordinates to a world coordinates.

configuration.title: Camera coordinates
configuration.label: In a first step, the pixel coordinates are transformed into the following reference frame:

parameter.name: CameraTopLeft
parameter.label: Top left corner of the camera

parameter.name: CameraBottomRight
parameter.label: Bottom right corner of the camera

configuration.title: World coordinates
configuration.label: In a second step, the camera coordinates are transformed into the following world coordinates:

parameter.name: WorldTopLeft
parameter.label: Top left corner of the world

parameter.name: WorldBottomRight
parameter.label: Bottom right corner of the world
